3_3.please_read: Please read the handbook and sign to agree to terms and conditions.
3_3.please_answer: Please respond to the following questions.
3_3.response_not_be_used: The response to these questions will not be used in the hiring process.
3_3.do_not_wish: I do not wish to provide the information requested below:
3_3.black: Black or African American (Not Hispanic or Latino)
3_3.native_hawaiian_or_other_pacific_islande: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander (Not Hispanic or Latino)
3_3.american_indian_or_alaska_native: American Indian or Alaska Native (Not Hispanic or Latino)
3_3.two_or_more_races: Two or More Races (Not Hispanic or Latino)
3_3.please_read_title: Please read the following for more information on why we request this information and for the EEOC Definitions of Race/Ethnicity.
3_3.please_read_desc_1: As an employer, we comply with government regulations and affirmative action responsibilities. Government agencies require periodic reports on the sex, ethnicity, disability and veteran status of applicants. This data is for analysis and affirmative action only.
3_3.please_read_desc_2: Solely to help us comply with government record keeping, reporting and other legal requirements, please fill out the Equal Employment Opportunity Questionnaire. This data will be kept in a Confidential File separate from the Application for Employment.
3_3.please_read_desc_3: This is a voluntary request and refusal to provide this information will not affect your employment application in any way. Place a check mark in the box provided below and print your name and date if you prefer not to provide this information.
3_3.please_read_desc_4: In some instances you will be asked to provide additional information and your electronic signature. Simply follow the instructions in each document and let us know if you have any questions.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_1: Hispanic of Latino - A person of Cuban, Mexican, Puerto Rican, South or Central American, or other Spanish culture or origin regardless of race.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_2: White (Not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of Europe, the Middle East, or North Africa.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_3: Black or African American (Not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the black racial groups of Africa.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_4: Native Hawaiian or Other Pacific Islander (Not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the peoples of Hawaii, Guam, Samoa, or other Pacific Islands.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_5: Asian (Not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of the Far East, Southeast Asia, or the Indian Subcontinent, including, for example, Cambodia, China, India, Japan, Korea, Malaysia, Pakistan, the Philippine Islands, Thailand, and Vietnam.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_6: American Indian or Alaska Native (Not Hispanic or Latino) - A person having origins in any of the original peoples of North and South America (including Central America), and who maintain tribal affiliation or community attachment.
3_3.eeoc_definitions_bullet_7: Two or More Races (Not Hispanic or Latino) - All persons who identify with more than one of the above five races.

general.email_change_desc: All onDiem email communications will be sent to this address. This will also be the email address that you use to log into your account.
general.change_password_desc: Once you click the Reset Password button below, a message will be sent to your email address with instructions for resetting your onDiem password.

general.deactivate_account_desc: Deactivating your account will remove your profile, name and photo from onDiem. You will not be able to access your account or any onDiem services.
general.deactivate_dialog_header: We need to verify this request
general.deactivate_dialog_body: Choosing to deactivate your account, even temporarily, is a big decision. Because of this, we want to make sure that you're the one making the request. Please check the email associated with this account for a message from onDiem.
general.deactivate_error_dialog_body: We are showing that you have unfinished business with onDiem. Please review your account to confirm that you have no future jobs booked, or unapproved timesheets. Once your business is resolved, you may resume the process to temporarily deactivate your account.

pto.title: PTO
pto.desc: 1 hour of PTO for every 24 hours you worked.
pto.info: PTO payments are considered taxable income. Your paystub will include the PTO amount paid, along with any deductions for state and federal taxes.
pto.you_dont_have_any_pto: You don\'t have any PTO cashouts!

healthcare_benefits.healthcare_info_box: To participate, enrollment must be completed within 30 days of eligibility, which is the date your first shift was confirmed.
healthcare_benefits.healthcare_description:
All onDiem professionals are eligible for health care benefits starting with their first shift.

We are pleased to offer all onDiem professionals access to health care benefits starting with their first shift.  onDiem has partnered with Medical StaffCARE to offer professionals a plan designed to cover day-to-day medical expenses, including routine medical visits, prescription drugs, and surgical care.  Professionals may also opt into a second plan designed to cover wellness and preventative medical services.

Each plan offers coverage for spouses and children under age 26.  Enrollment and payment details vary.
healthcare_benefits.enroll_dialog_question: Are you sure you want to enroll in healthcare benefits?

become_ba.title: Become an Brand Ambassador today
become_ba.desc: Receive commissions for every dental practice or professional you bring on board. There's nothing to lose and everything to gain-including extra income, a vibrant community of like-minded professionals, and the chance to build invaluable relationships across the industry.
become_ba.earn_extra_title: Earn extra income in a career you already love!
become_ba.earn_extra_desc: Our Brand Ambassadors are awesome hygienists who help us create new work opportunities locally. there are no  MLM schemes or hidden costs - just a chance to get paid working temp shifts, to earn benefits like PTO, and to earn commissions each time you help someone else realize the value of working with onDiem.
become_ba.spread_the_world_title: Spread the word and get paid for every sign-up
become_ba.spread_the_world_desc: Earn residual, monthly commissions for every practice you refer that signs up for our monthly subscription plan. Customers you refer will receive special plan pricing just for working through you, along with all the usual benefits enjoyed by our subscribers.
become_ba.spread_the_world_desc_2: Refer your friends and colleagues to sign up for an onDiem account and earn a commission for each new profile created. You'll even earn an additional commission when your friend works their first shift through onDiem.
become_ba.what_if: What if I'm not a Dental Hygienist?

paper_work.title: New Hire Paperwork
paper_work.w4_desc: Your position requires completion of the onDiem Handbook, state and federal W-4 tax forms (if applicable in your state), and a payroll direct deposit form.
paper_work.emergency_contact_desc: The following individual is listed as your emergency contact in case of an accident or a medical emergency. No further action is required for this item. If there is an update or an error please contact onDiem Support.
paper_work.auth_agent_desc_1: The Federal Government requires that we use the I-9 form to verify identity and legal employment eligibility for both citizens and non-citizens.
paper_work.auth_agent_desc_2: Step 1: To verify your I-9 documents remotely, you will need to choose an Authorized Agent that will review your documents and verify your identity.
paper_work.auth_agent_desc_3: An Authorized Agent is any person of your choice who is over the age of 18 and not a family member or spouse (e.g. a neighbor, friend, or co-worker).
paper_work.auth_agent_desc_4: Step 2: After you submit their name and email, we will initiate the I-9 process and you will receive an email with further instructions. Once completed, your Authorized Agent will need to attest to your documents.
paper_work.authorized_agent_information: Thank you for completing the I-9 verification process.
paper_work.assign_on_diem: Assign onDiem as my auth agent

w4.desc: Please complete the required W-4 forms (federal and state if that is applicable to you) and the Direct Deposit forms required to ensure that we know where to send your paycheck!
w4.desc_1: W-4s: These forms help tell us how much we should withhold from your paycheck for state and federal taxes.
w4.desc_2: Direct Deposit Form: This form is to let us know where to send your paycheck. Please make sure to review your routing and account number twice for accuracy to avoid delays in payment due to transposed numbers or lack of numbers
w4.desc_final: Please follow all instructions in each document and if you need any assistance at any time please contact onDiem Support.
w4.desc_in_progress_1: There are a few things we still need from you in order to complete this step.
w4.desc_in_progress_2: Return to the HelloWorks site, so you may pick up where you left off reviewing and providing information to onDiem.
w4.desc_complete: Your W-4 forms and direct deposit form are complete. No further action is required for this item. In the event your information changes or if there is an error, please contact onDiem Support.

cert_vac.desc: Your position may require confirmation of a current BLS certificate, a current CPR certificate, and/or a Hepatitis B vaccination.
cert_vac.hep_desc: If your state requires a Hepatitis B vaccination for your job, please confirm your inoculation and year inoculated.
cert_vac.cert_decs: Your position may require confirmation of a current {} certificate.

my_jobs.safety_protocols: Personal Protective Equipment and Safety Protocols
my_jobs.practice_adheres: This practice adheres to advanced standards of safety. Here's what they provide:

offer_list.hours_overlap_with_my_other_job: Hours overlap with my other job
offer_list.i_have_concerns_with_the_employer: I have concerns with the employer

offer_list.help_us_understand: Help us understand how to get you your ideal job.\n\nReasons you decline

view_playbook.title: Practice Playbook
view_playbook.playbook_preface: To help prepare for your shift, check out the Playbook below from {}.
view_playbook.equipment: The practice provides the following PPE:
view_playbook.safety_protocol_description: The protocols in place to ensure everyone’s safety:
view_playbook.safety_professional_expectations: Requirements from each employee to maintain a high standard of safety:
view_playbook.safety_all_employee_expectations: Additional behavior that is expect to keep safety a top priority:
view_playbook.is_screening_patient_safety: Are there daily health screening checkpoints and log for all employees entering the workplace?
view_playbook.is_using_alcohol_based_sanitizer: The CDC recommends using alcohol-based hand sanitizer with 60-95% alcohol in healthcare settings. Unless hands are visibly soiled, an alcohol-based hand rub is preferred over soap and water in most clinical situations. Does the practice follow this recommendation?
view_playbook.has_written_sterilization_protocol: Does the practice have a written Sterilization Protocol?
view_playbook.is_epa_criteria_met: For disinfection, practices are to use products that meet EPA’s criteria for use against SARS-CoV-2 (the cause of COVID-19) and are appropriate for the surface, following the manufacturer’s instructions. Does the practice follow these guidelines?
view_playbook.is_headset_offered: Are individual headsets provided for each front desk staffer?
view_playbook.reduce_handpiece_viral_spread: If individual headsets are not provided for each front desk staffer, what system do you have in place to reduce virus spread through the phone handpiece?
view_playbook.is_screening_patient_temperature: Patient’s temperatures taken immediately when they walk into the practice?
view_playbook.is_requiring_patient_masks: Patients to wear masks at all times, until they are being treated?
view_playbook.is_requiring_patient_documents: Patients to sign a document stating they have not experienced signs/symptoms of COVID-19 in the past 14 days?
view_playbook.is_requiring_post_patient_contact: Patients to inform your practice if they develop any symptoms or are diagnosed with COVID-19 within 2 days following a dental appointment?
view_playbook.is_providing_hand_hygiene: Easy and accessible methods for all patients to take care of their hand hygiene (e.g., hand sanitizer, wash stations)?
view_playbook.secondary_contact_description: The person you should reach if you run into unforeseeable circumstances, unable to reach the main contact or need to contact the practice outside of normal business hours.
view_playbook.has_break_room: Does the office include a break room?
view_playbook.has_break_fridge: Does the office have a refrigerator?
view_playbook.has_break_microwave: Does the office have a microwave?
view_playbook.single_or_accelerated_hygiene: Does the practice run single or accelerated hygiene?
view_playbook.average_time_between_appointments_minute: On average, the amount of time allotted between appointments?
view_playbook.being_paid_header: You will be paid through our platform, after submitting your timesheets.
view_playbook.being_paid_body:
Within 24 hours of your shift, you are responsible for filling out your timesheet to reflect actual hours worked. The practice will approve or request an edit if there is a discrepancy.

Upon your approval, you will be paid by onDiem. Remember: You should never receive payment from the practice directly.
view_playbook.communication_header: All communication between you and the practice and should stay within our platform.
view_playbook.communication_body: Safety’s our top priority. We ask that any messaging and communication happen through our platform for everyone’s safety.
